commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I was able to spend time with Aqours and make the festival a success with them. I got really lucky.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It was a great experience, too.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Umm, is everyone practicing right now?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: One, two, three, four! One, two, three, four!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hoh, hoh, hoh, hoh...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now for my jump!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone, you're so great! Your movements are way better than before!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, you're back! Welcome back.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's good to be back!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Welcome home."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Let's take five here!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We've been practicing a lot while you've been gone.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Did you see my jump? I got better while you were visiting Aqours, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Kanata was the one that said if you're going to better yourself by meeting Aqours, we should better ourselves, too.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Giggle* I have good foresight.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Your dance moves were great just now. I can tell how much you guys practiced.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Wait, what's that you're holding?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's a picture of Aqours! Is this from when you went to Uchiura? What a gem!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It is. I put all my pictures of my time spent with them in an album.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: There are comments on all the pictures. I can't believe you've made something like this in such a short time.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Giggle* I feel so many things looking at these pictures.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: These might inspire some great lyrics.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I actually thought the same thing, and I started writing some. I think they're coming out nicely!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh ho! Looks like we all need to work hard, too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So have you written a new song?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, not yet. I actually tried to write one, but it turned out like the songs I wrote before.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I see...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Everyone's been practicing so much and growing a lot.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (While they were working hard, I met Aqours and had fun. I can't leave it at that.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I need to make an effort to support everyone even more.)

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: To make a song you've never made before, you need some more stimulation. Something that slams you, right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Something that slams you?! Sounds scary to me!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Me, too. Rina-chan Board says, "Heart-pounding."

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Just what kind of stimulation are you guys imagining?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I think what you need is something to heighten your feelings for school idols.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You just got back from seeing Aqours, but maybe you could go see them again?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I know! How about going to see μ's next?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I bet it'd be amazing if you went and met with μ's!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Let's get them to tell us how we can grow so quickly!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: But what if they just say we weren't born with the talent or something?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We can't do anything about that. Rina-chan Board says, "Disappointment."

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Meeting them would be such a good experience, but it's tough meeting popular school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Actually, about that...

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: An interview with μ's?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There's a plan to interview them on one of their fan sites. They were looking for someone to represent their fan base, so I applied!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Seriously?! You really know how to take action.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone is practicing hard and improving, and I didn't want to fall behind.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Take a close look at μ's for us, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No problem!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I want to create a performance that will make a lasting impression, just like μ's and Aqours!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I-I'm here! μ's' club room!)
Huh? Are you the interviewer?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-Yes!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Nice to meet you! I'm Honoka Kosaka.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Wh-Whoa... It's Honoka Kosaka!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The image of μ's up on stage from that day I saw their live show is stilled burned into my mind.)

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I get nervous thinking about what I'm supposed to say in an interview. But maybe you're nervous, too! Then we'd be nervous together!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: U-Umm...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I'm sorry if she surprised you. Honoka! We can't have you do all the talking by yourself!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: *Chuckle* I was just really looking forward to this.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I'm Umi Sonoda. We've all been excited to do this interview.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I'm Kotori Minami. Nice to meet you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Honoka, Umi, Kotori! Nice to meet you, too!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh, good, you're the same age as us! I was afraid you might be an adult, and get real serious with your questions.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah, I'm glad. She seems nice too.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: An interview, huh. Do we even have anything to talk about?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rin, Maki, and Hanayo, nice to meet you too.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Thanks for coming today! We'll tell you everything we can, so ask whatever question you want.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Eli, Nozomi, Nico! I'm glad to hear you say that!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Before we start, just one thing. Considering we're all high school students, let there be no formalities, okay?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: O-Okay! Got it!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You still seem nervous. Well, I guess that can't be helped standing in front of the universe's greatest, number one idol, Nico!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Take it slow. Let's have fun with this interview.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It will be my pleasure... I mean, sure!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I came to interview you all about what kind of lives you lead day to day. I hope to learn a lot!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Sure thing!
